map.dawn: early dawn, pale sky, cool low-angle light and quiet haze
map.morning: clear morning light, fresh air, gentle contrast and clean highlights
map.midday: bright midday light, neutral balance, minimal long shadows and crisp clarity
map.golden_hour: golden hour, warm low sun, long soft shadows and gentle glow
map.blue_hour: blue hour twilight, cool ambient tones, soft silhouettes and calm atmosphere
map.night: deep night, low ambient visibility, restrained highlights and quiet darkness
map.overcast: overcast daylight, diffused soft illumination, muted contrast and subdued palette
